attributes.action: not let millwey rise post office in axminster devon close.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the closure is based on out of date information.the facts and figures that the proposed closure is based on are far from true at present,and also on predicted figures for the future.this will effect the lively hood of atleast 2,000 people that use millwey rise post office at present.the facilities at this post office are totally accessible for all age groups and abillities.it is a most friendly and helpful post office and caters for people with dissabilties of all natures.(wheelchair access,parking directly outside,seating if necessary and assistance if needed to fill in forms etc because of eyesight problems).if this post office is closed on information that is used at present it will be totally incompetent.you need true information directly from the post office on this lovely estate,which is expandng all the time with a growing population of people,housing and buisnesses.
